channel.title: LGBTQ+ on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LGBTQ+ on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Gamers Are Furious About the Censorship of NSFW Games—and They’re Fighting Back
item.description: As industry groups decry censorship, players are flooding Visa and Mastercard with complaints and sharing the titles of delisted NSFW games to support developers.

item.title: Gamers Are Furious About the Censorship of NSFW Games—and They’re Fighting Back
item.description: As industry groups decry censorship, players are flooding Visa and Mastercard with complaints and sharing the titles of delisted NSFW games to support developers.

item.title: These LGBTQ+ Archives Defy Erasure, One Memory at a Time
item.description: In Latin America, LGBTQ+ history collections are a form of resistance. Grassroots projects are using the memories of community members to fight against systematic violence and demand justice.
